text: moved plenty times - same old everywhere you end up
new places spark different vibes tho
change doesn’t guarantee improvement sns
stuff found raises questions though
sure we find stuff from the past underground but doesn't mean there’s some spooky tale attached - could be just someone's old junk forgotten down there
legends usually hint at some truth - makes you wonder what gets overlooked because it seems too fantastical right?
pension plan enrolment hit different
100% gets more real without your better half around.

old school here but listen - thinking you'll have it all sorted by 40's just another tall tale. retirement’s around and guess what? still figuring things out daily. nobody has all answers, regardless of how many candles on your birthday cake.
trust me no one’s life script is error-free
life plans? best joke i've heard all week
learnt real quick that book smarts only get you so far - office chess plays by its own rules!
college makes it seem like you'll waltz into high-paying jobs but forgets to mention climbing up from zero ain’t just book smarts—it’s grit and gamesmanship nobody grades ya on!
times change but some mindsets stick - saw it plenty back then
and health issues? no one talks bout those roadblocks enough...
happily-ever-after's overrated anyways – just causes grief
romance takes work, just like wine-making
but flexibility's crucial too no?
stuff changes but doesn't mean it's better
tech makes it easy but nothing beats an old-school invite in your hand feels more like someone actually wants you there
old habits die hard - even at bbqs!

everyone waxes poetic bout their birthplace like it’s written in stone shaping us - nah sometimes you're just dealt cards & play em your way not every windy day makes you unshakeable or community vibe turns ya kind
nostalgia hits hard sometimes
